movies.title: Gourine et la queue du renard
movies.originalTitle: Solan, Ludvig og Gurin med reverompa
movies.plot: Gurin the gnome loves to play tricks on others. In spite of several warnings he just can't help himself, and one morning he wakes up with a foxtail as punishment. Rumors of his fabulous tail soon reach the capital, and the widow Stengelføhn-Glad tries to hire private detective Solan Gundersen to find Gurin. She wants to be the envy of her upper-class friends by owning the luxurious foxtail. But Solan and his sidekick Ludvig doesn't want to see Gurin come to harm. And after refusing the assignment they set out to find the gnome before the widow does.
movies.simplePlot: A gnome named Gurin wakes up with a foxtail as punishment for his practical jokes.

biography.bio: Toralv Maurstad was born on November 24, 1926 in Bærum, Norway. He is an actor and director, known for Hotel Cæsar (1998), Gourine et la queue du renard (1998) and Song of Norway (1970). He has been married to Beate Eriksen since December 31, 2000. He was previously married to Eva Henning and Anne-Ma Burum.
biography.name: Toralv Maurstad

biography.bio: Grethe Kausland was born on July 3, 1947 in Horten, Norway as Grethe Nilsen. She was an actress, known for Karl & Co (1998), D'ække bare, bare Bernt (1996) and Ugler i mosen (1959). She died on November 16, 2007 in Oslo, Norway.
biography.name: Grethe Kausland

biography.bio: Pia Borgli was born on April 28, 1959. She is known for her work on Amalies jul (1995), Gourine et la queue du renard (1998) and Shut Up and Listen! (1995).
biography.name: Pia Borgli

biography.bio: Wenche Foss was born on December 5, 1917 in Oslo, Norway as Eva Wenche Steenfeldt-Foss Stang. She was an actress, known for Dina (2002), Soyez naturelle (1993) and The Master and His Servants (1959). She was married to Thomas Stang and Alf Scott-Hansen, Jr. She died on March 28, 2011 in Oslo.
biography.name: Wenche Foss

biography.bio: Helge Reiss was born on February 27, 1928 in Norway. He was an actor and writer, known for Jamais sans ma mère (2003), Gourine et la queue du renard (1998) and Olsenbanden for full musikk (1976). He died on November 11, 2009 in Norway.
biography.name: Helge Reiss

biography.bio: Frank Robert was born on October 12, 1918 in Oslo, Norway. He was an actor, known for Herman (1990), Fools in the Mountains (1957) and En fallitt (1979). He was married to Randi Brænne. He died on July 13, 2007 in Oslo.
biography.name: Frank Robert

biography.bio: Bjørn Jenseg was born on July 28, 1932 in Sarpsborg, Norway. He was an actor, known for Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003), O'Horten (2007) and Down, Across (1997). He died on March 4, 2008 in Oslo, Norway.
biography.name: Bjørn Jenseg

biography.bio: Anders Hatlo was born on August 17, 1947 in Norway as Anders Cristian Hatlo. He is an actor and director, known for Hotel Cæsar (1998), Radio 2 (1995) and På stigende kurs (1987).
biography.name: Anders Hatlo

biography.bio: Kari Ann Grønsund is an actress, known for De la neige pour Noël (2013), Over stork og stein (1994) and Magic Silver (2009).
biography.name: Kari Ann Grønsund

biography.bio: Marit Andreassen was born in 1966 in Norway as Marit Adeleide Andreassen. She is an actress, known for Jonny Vang (2003), Elias and the Royal Yacht (2007) and Beatles (2014).
biography.name: Marit Andreassen

biography.bio: Sossen Krohg was born on December 18, 1923 in Oslo, Norway. She was an actress and writer, known for Hotel Cæsar (1998), Through My Thick Glasses (2004) and Herman (1990). She was married to Guy Krohg and Thorleif Schjelderup. She died on February 12, 2016 in Norway.
biography.name: Sossen Krohg

biography.bio: Anitra Eriksen was born on November 21, 1956 in Verdal, Norway. She is an actress, known for Børning (2014), Dina (2002) and Over stork og stein (1994).
biography.name: Anitra Eriksen

biography.bio: Trond Brænne was born on July 31, 1953 in Oslo, Norway. He was an actor, known for Kitchen stories - chroniques de cuisine (2003), De la neige pour Noël (2013) and Jonny Vang (2003). He died on March 16, 2013 in Oslo.
biography.name: Trond Brænne

biography.bio: Lasse Lindtner was born on March 7, 1955 in Norway. He is an actor, known for Holms (2002), Buicken - store gutter gråter ikke (1991) and Hotel Cæsar (1998).
biography.name: Lasse Lindtner

biography.bio: Ingrid Vollan is known for her work on Himmelblå (2008), De la neige pour Noël (2013) and Mother Said (a Year Younger) (2000).
biography.name: Ingrid Vollan
